name: SOLAXI
description:
HELP SOLAXI NAVIGATE FROM PORTAL TO PORTAL

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 (with the theme “only one”), SOLAXIS presents a platformer in which the character, Solaxi, exists on a single vertical axis.

Levels are cylindrical and can be rotated using A and D. Solaxi’s axis exists along the surface of this cylinder – platforms and obstacles only become an issue when they reach this line. If the ground keeps moving underneath him, Solaxi will run along it like he’s on a treadmill. Space can be held to charge a jump and glide over and around obstacles.

But be careful… if Solaxi is knocked from this axis, it’s game over!!
